architecture.characters

Class Combatant

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • architecture.characters.Combatant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Monster, Player

    public abstract class Combatant
extends java.util.TimerTask
implements Renderable
    The abstract class for all objects which engage in battle. Combatant handles attribute and stats (numerical values relevant to calculating various aspects of battle), storage of volatile effects, changes in health and mana, location and movement etc.

      • accelerate

        public void accelerate(float x,
                       float y)
        Accelerates left if x is positive, right if negative. Accelerates down if y is positive, up if negative.
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -

      • move

        public void move()
        Moves the Combatant based on current velocity.

        public void stop()
        Stops the Combatant, setting velocities to zero.

        public void run()
        Specified by:

        Specified by:

      • attack

        public void attack(Combatant defender)
        Attacks another Combatant. The Attack is only carried out if the Attacker is read (bar is full). Attacking resets the bar.
        Parameters:
        defender - the other Combatant

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Returns:
        if the Combatant is dead

      • isInRange

        public boolean isInRange(Combatant other)
        Tests if the Combatant is "in range" of another Combatant, which is a prerequisite to attacking.
        Parameters:
        other - the other Combatant
        Returns:
        if this is in range of another Combatant

      • updateAttributes

        public abstract void updateAttributes()
        Updates the attributes of the Combatant, which in turn updates the stats. Method is called whenever equipment or volatile effects change.

      • getRange

        public abstract int getRange()
        Returns:
        attack range

      • resetAttributes

        protected void resetAttributes()
        Resets attribute to their base values. To be called only when updating attributes.

      • updateStats

        protected void updateStats()
        Updates the stats of the combatant based purely on attributes and volatile effects.

      • restoreHealth

        public void restoreHealth(int value)
        Restores health to the combatant. Health must remain under HP stat (max HP).
        Parameters:
        value - health to restore

      • setHealthFull

        public void setHealthFull()
        Restores combatant health to full (HP stat).

      • restoreMana

        public void restoreMana(int value)
        Restores mana to the combatant. Mana must remain under mana stat (max mana).
        Parameters:
        value - mana to restore

      • setManaFull

        public void setManaFull()
        Restores combatant mana to full (mana stat).

      • healthLoss

        public void healthLoss(int value)
        Deducts health from combatant. If new health is less than 0, death() is called.
        Parameters:
        value - health to deduct

      • death

        public void death()
        Method called when health of Combatant reaches zero. Death of monster removes it from the game and awards exp/items to player, while death of player ends the game.

      • getLevel

        public int getLevel()
        Returns:
        Returns the level.

      • setLevel

        public void setLevel(int level)
        Parameters:
        level - The level to set.

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()
        Returns:
        Returns the health.

      • setHealth

        public void setHealth(int health)
        Parameters:
        health - The health to set.

      • getMana

        public int getMana()
        Returns:
        Returns the mana.

      • getActionBar

        public int getActionBar()
        Returns the amount of action preparedness.
        Returns:
        actionBar

      • setMana

        public void setMana(int mana)
        Parameters:
        mana - The mana to set.

      • getBaseAttributes

        public int[] getBaseAttributes()
        Returns:
        Returns the attributes in array form. Attributes are (in order): [STR, INT, DEX, SPD, VIT, WIS, LUK].

      • setBaseAttributes

        public void setBaseAttributes(int[] baseAttributes)
        Parameters:
        baseAttributes - The baseAttributes to set.

      • getModifiedAttributes

        public int[] getModifiedAttributes()
        Returns:
        Returns the modifiedAttributes.

      • getStats

        public Stats getStats()
        Returns:
        Returns the stats in array form. Stats are (in order): [HP, mana, ATK, DEF, ACC, AVO, CRIT, CRITAVO].

      • printStatus

        public void printStatus()
        Prints a summary of Monster's type, level, HP, mana, attributes, and stats. For testing only.
